The claim that Obama ordered the CIA to train and arm Islamic State fighters originated from a 2015 article on NewsPunch, a website known for publishing junk news and sensationalist distortions of real news stories. The article cited declassified documents from the U.S. Department of Defense and the State Department, which were misinterpreted to support the false claim.
